text:
(1)
Hamilton Avenue, north side, between Lenox Place and Phelps Place, showing the gate and gate-house to the old A.P. Stokes mansion.

March 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Another view of the entrance to the estate, viewed westward from Egmont Place. In the right background appears part of the mansion.

March 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
